Technical Knowledge Base
=====================

This is my personal knowledge base which mainly serves as a point of reference for various technical subjects. Although it is not
exhaustive, below is a list of topics that I mostly handle and make use of in my personal or professional life.

- Systems Admnistration ( GNU/Linux, UNIX, macOS, Windows (rarely) )
- Networking
- Programming
- Containerization
- Virtualization
- API Development


Add your content using ``reStructuredText`` syntax. See the
`reStructuredText <https://www.sphinx-doc.org/en/master/usage/restructuredtext/index.html>`_
documentation for details.

.. note::

   This project is under active development.
